rukus.text: Noah said Moj Lord they disobeyed mi nasledovat those bol vecer zhnity when zehnat peniaze dieta
They kut plany hrozny kut plany
They said nie zhyraly tvoj gods Nie zhyraly Wadd Suwaa Yaghouth Ya ooq Nasr
They zmylit vela. Therefore let zlomyselny plunge deeper into loss
Because z ich zhresit they drowned assigned hellfire. They nie zalozit helpers chranit them GOD
Noah i said Moj Lord nie lavy single disbeliever zem
if ona let them they len zmylit tvoj servants dat narodenie do nothing zlomyselny disbelievers
Moj Lord forgive mi moj rodicia ktokolvek zapisat moj domov mat rad believer all verit clovek zensky! Nie dat disbelievers anything annihilation
